Router 1:

en
conf t
int fa2/0
ip address 192.168.1.1 255.255.255.128
no shut
exit
int fa0/0
ip address 192.168.10.1 255.255.255.252
no shut
exit
int fa1/0
ip address 192.168.40.2 255.255.255.252
no shut
exit
ip route 192.168.2.0 255.255.255.192 192.168.10.2
ip route 192.168.4.0 255.255.255.240 192.168.40.1
ip route 192.168.30.0 255.255.255.252 192.168.40.1
ip route 192.168.3.0 255.255.255.224 192.168.40.1

Router 2:

en
conf t
int fa2/0
ip address 192.168.2.1 255.255.255.192
no shut
exit
int fa0/0
ip address 192.168.20.1 255.255.255.252
no shut
exit
int fa1/0
ip address 192.168.10.2 255.255.255.252
no shut
exit
ip route 192.168.1.0 255.255.255.128 192.168.10.1
ip route 192.168.3.0 255.255.255.224 192.168.20.2
ip route 192.168.30.0 255.255.255.252 192.168.20.2
ip route 192.168.4.0 255.255.255.240 192.168.20.2

Router 3:

en
conf t
int fa2/0
ip address 192.168.3.1 255.255.255.224
no shut
exit
int fa0/0
ip address 192.168.30.1 255.255.255.252
no shut
exit
int fa1/0
ip address 192.168.20.2 255.255.255.252
no shut
exit
ip route 192.168.2.0 255.255.255.192 192.168.20.1
ip route 192.168.4.0 255.255.255.240 192.168.30.2
ip route 192.168.40.0 255.255.255.252 192.168.30.2
ip route 192.168.1.0 255.255.255.128 192.168.30.2

Router 4:

en
conf t
int fa2/0
ip address 192.168.4.1 255.255.255.240
no shut
exit
int fa0/0
ip address 192.168.40.1 255.255.255.252
no shut
exit
int fa1/0
ip address 192.168.30.2 255.255.255.252
no shut
exit
ip route 192.168.1.0 255.255.255.128 192.168.40.2
ip route 192.168.3.0 255.255.255.224 192.168.30.1
ip route 192.168.20.0 255.255.255.252 192.168.30.1
ip route 192.168.2.0 255.255.255.192 192.168.30.1
